title: (x) Pointing hand dingbats - various {gang}
content: besides "Wood Type Ornaments 2" and Zapf Dingbats do you know of a set that has the pointing hand?
author: tsprowl

comments.content: Adobe Caslon Ornaments has it... and, um... Wingdings? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103134250im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

[LettError Salmiak](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103134250/http:/www.letterror.com/foundry/salmiak/index.html) has some nice hand-drawn pointing hands in the Catchwords font that is part of the package. [DF Calligraphic Ornaments](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103134250/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/calligraphic-ornaments/) have some fancy pen-drawn hands too (See character map).

IIRC, Scala has a dingbat font with fists.   
   
[It's the [Scala 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103134250/http:/www.fontfont.com/shop/index.ep?cview=P70390S&clist=PS) set actually. $40 for just the hands.]   
   
[Erp. As Tiffany says below, it's Sacala _Sans_]

All my hands:   
   
http://lindkvist.com/2.0/typo\_samples/hands.html   
   
XPointed desert:   
   
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ingrimayne/xpointed-desert/   
   
Handsome:   
   
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/handsome/   
   
XPhyngern:   
   
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ingrimayne/xphyngern/

Zapfino has some lovely fists, some with elegant pearl bracelets.   
There's also a duck. ![zapf fists](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103134250im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26925.jpg)

Fountain's [Zanzibar](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103134250/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?Image=FOT0000069) also has a pair of calligraphic hands similar in style to the ones found in Zapfino.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103134250im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26929.gif)   
   
 No duck, but there is a pineapple.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141103134250im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26930.gif)
i love that pineapple, i may use it on my little sister's wedding announcements. ;^)

y'no I had a spread sheet of Zanzibar out of Applied Arts mag taped up to the fridge during christmas - our pseudo santa list (the fridge door)   
   
Zanzibar didn't make it - the people in the house just don't understand and thought I'd get more of a kick from the new socks ( I did have lots of socks on the list)   
   
anyway - thanks alot for the list eh. Its a suggestion I wanted to put into myfonts.com...dingbats and all - I search for specific ones way too often without noting.   
   
you guys hit it.
FF Scala Sans has some good pointing fingers. Even some using different fingers.
